articles.title: Prices of edible oil prices fall nearly Rs10/kg in last 30 days; may fall further: Industry - CNBCTV18
articles.description: A combination of retailers reducing prices before Diwali and the Centre reducing import duties has resulted in a Rs8-10 per kg reduction in oil prices. Industry insiders said they expect the prices to fall by a further Rs3-4 per kg in the coming days.
